name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabGPT: Ask ChatGPT, Gemini and Claude at the same time with one click

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask ChatGPT, Gemini and Claude at the same time with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabGPT is a powerful Chrome extension that simplifies your interactions with multiple language models. Write one prompt and ask ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude at the same time.

Will open your question in a new tab and compile the answers.

Whether you're a developer, researcher, or casual user, TabGPT optimizes your workflow all in one place. Perfect for brainstorming, problem-solving, and creative writing.

Simple ask ChatGPT with the shortcut ALT + J


-------- This is a beta -------
Stability will be improved.
Please send your user requests
